name: dApp Architecture
description: Understanding the core components and structure of decentralized applications.

cards.title: Introduction to dApps
cards.description: Understanding the fundamental differences between traditional apps and dApps.
cards.bulletpoints: Decentralization vs. centralization, advantages of dApps, common use cases
cards.summaryText: Compare centralized apps with dApps so you can explain why decentralization, token incentives, and censorship resistance matter.

cards.title: Decentralized Backend & Blockchain Integration
cards.description: How dApps interact with blockchain networks through smart contracts and node providers.
cards.bulletpoints: Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, RPC endpoints, node providers (Infura, Alchemy)
cards.summaryText: Sketch the path from smart contract ABI to RPC calls and managed node providers so frontends can hit multiple chains reliably.

cards.title: Decentralized Storage Solutions
cards.description: Leveraging decentralized file storage systems for dApp data persistence.
cards.bulletpoints: IPFS, Arweave, Filecoin, comparing centralized vs. decentralized storage
cards.summaryText: Evaluate IPFS, Arweave, and Filecoin trade-offs to choose decentralized storage that fits your dApp's permanence and cost needs.
